effect.black_white: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.black_2_white_2: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.black_white: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.black_white: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user’s party.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user’s party.
